titleStmt.title: yum brgyad stong pa'i don bsdus
titleStmt.author: 'bre shes rab 'bar

editionStmt.edition: Digital Edition in Wylie with TEI Markup

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence applies to this document.

physDesc.additional: Script: 'bru tsha. Fol. 1 missing. Two folios between fol. 5 and 7, numbered "drug gong ma" and "drug." Folio number on last folio: nye gnyis bzhugs so Orthography: - Palatalization of m (e.g., dmyigs), but not systematic - Bindu for m - Numerals used for numbers - Additional 'a rjes 'jug (e.g., dpe', dgu') - the tsom for the tshom - chu.ngu (or chung_ngu?) for chung ngu - b frequently not closed on the top (looking like p) where b is expected (e.g., byang chub) - Space used with the value of shad - A few abbreviations (e.g., for thams cad, sems can) - In the interlinear notes, Na for myed Interlinear notes referring to the Tibetan translation of the base text and some glosses in cursive script (notably, indicating the absence of a corresponding commentary). A number of insertions (corrections). On fol. 15a, a few insertions in dbu can, e.g., fols. 13b, 15a.

projectDesc.p: This document was created and is made available in the framework of the ERC project “The Dawn of Tibetan Buddhist Scholasticism (11th-13th c.) (TibSchol). This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement No. 101001002). See https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/101001002

prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab:
bcom ldan 'das yum brgyad stong pa'i don bsdus pa
slob dpon seng ge bzang po'i rjes su 'brangs te | lo tsha ba chen po dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir sbyar ba las | dus phyis jo bo 'bum pa dang lo tsha ba de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang zhing mang du thos pa'i dge slong shes rab 'bar gyis mdo'i don legs par gtan la phab nas yang zhus te sbyar ba || || rdzogs s+ho || ||

@@ || yul chos skor bsaM yas kyi lung phran mchims phu'i gtsug lag khang du mang du thos pa'i khu lha sdings pa la dge slong ¦ bshes gnyen lha sdings pa'i gsung gi bdud rtsi lhung posReading "lhung pos" uncertain la ngoms ngoms su 'thungs pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' rab 'byaMs pa rtsod pa myed pa rnaMs la blo gros kyi snang pa rab tu rgyas pa khyung po 'dul ba 'dzin pa'i spyan sngar bdag mchod nas lho brag rong pa bla ma 'od kyis yig mkhan byas nas bris so ||

@|| 'di bris pa'i bsod naMs kyis || yon mchod byang chub thob par shog || bkra shis par gyur cig || || The following sentence is written in slightly smaller charactersmdo smad pa mar pa ston pas bris so | legs so |
